AMBARI_SERVER.name: ambari_server_agent_heartbeat
AMBARI_SERVER.label: Ambari Agent Heartbeat
AMBARI_SERVER.description: This alert is triggered if the server has lost contact with an agent.

AMBARI_SERVER.name: ambari_server_stale_alerts
AMBARI_SERVER.label: Ambari Server Alerts
AMBARI_SERVER.description: This alert is triggered if the server detects that there are alerts which have not run in a timely manner.

parameters.name: stale.interval.multiplier
parameters.description: The number of intervals which must pass before an an alert is considered stale. This value is a multiplier for each alert's individual interval.

AMBARI_SERVER.name: ambari_server_performance
AMBARI_SERVER.label: Ambari Server Performance
AMBARI_SERVER.description: This alert is triggered if the Ambari Server detects that there is a potential performance problem with Ambari. This type of issue can arise for many reasons, but is typically attributed to slow database queries and host resource exhaustion.

parameters.name: request.by.status.warning.threshold
parameters.description: The time to find requests in progress before a warning alert is triggered.

parameters.name: request.by.status.critical.threshold
parameters.description: The time to find requests in progress before a critical alert is triggered.

parameters.name: task.status.aggregation.warning.threshold
parameters.description: The time to calculate a request's status from its tasks before a warning alert is triggered.

parameters.name: task.status.aggregation.critical.threshold
parameters.description: The time to calculate a request's status from its tasks before a critical alert is triggered.

parameters.name: rest.api.cluster.warning.threshold
parameters.description: The time to get a cluster via the REST API before a warning alert is triggered.

parameters.name: rest.api.cluster.critical.threshold
parameters.description: The time to get a cluster via the REST API before a critical alert is triggered.

AMBARI_SERVER.name: ambari_server_component_version
AMBARI_SERVER.label: Component Version
AMBARI_SERVER.description: This alert is triggered if the server detects that there is a problem with the expected and reported version of a component. The alert is suppressed automatically during an upgrade.

AMBARI_AGENT.name: ambari_agent_disk_usage
AMBARI_AGENT.label: Host Disk Usage
AMBARI_AGENT.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the amount of disk space used goes above specific thresholds. The default threshold values are 50% for WARNING and 80% for CRITICAL.

parameters.name: minimum.free.space
parameters.description: The overall amount of free disk space left before an alert is triggered.

parameters.name: percent.used.space.warning.threshold
parameters.description: The percent of disk space consumed before a warning is triggered.

parameters.name: percent.free.space.critical.threshold
parameters.description: The percent of disk space consumed before a critical alert is triggered.

AMBARI_AGENT.name: ambari_agent_ulimit
AMBARI_AGENT.label: Ulimit for open files
AMBARI_AGENT.description: This host-level alert is triggered if value of ulimit for open files (-n) goes above specific thresholds. The default threshold values are 200000 for WARNING and 800000 for CRITICAL.

parameters.name: ulimit.warning.threshold
parameters.description: The threshold of ulimit for open files (-n) for WARNING alert.

parameters.name: ulimit.critical.threshold
parameters.description: The threshold of ulimit for open files (-n) for CRITICAL alert.

AMBARI_AGENT.name: ambari_agent_version_select
AMBARI_AGENT.label: Ambari Agent Distro/Conf Select Versions
AMBARI_AGENT.description: This host-level alert is triggered if the distro selector such as hdp-select cannot calculate versions available on this host. This may indicate that /usr/$stack/ directory has links/dirs that do not belong inside of it.
